featured_question.question:
(Google tarafindan cevrilmistir) Odeme ag gecidi ile e-ticaret sitesi ve android uygulamasi yapmak istiyoruz

(Orijinal)
We want to make  e-commerce website and android app  with payment gateway
featured_question.answer:
(Google tarafindan cevrilmistir) Bir e-ticaret uygulamasi ve web sitesi olusturmanin en iyi yolu WooCommerce kullanmaktir. WordPress, dunyadaki en populer icerik yonetim sistemlerinden biridir ve WooCommerce, WordPress icin en populer e-ticaret eklentilerinden biridir. WordPress acik kaynaklidir ve binlerce tema ve eklentiye sahiptir. WooCommerce, kurulumu en kolay e-Ticaret platformlarindan biridir. Basarili bir e-Ticaret isi baslatmak icin ihtiyaciniz olan tum ozelliklere sahiptir: satis, destek, urun sayfasi, odeme sayfasi, musteri panosu, stok yonetimi ve urun yonetimi.

(Orijinal)
The best way to make an e-commerce app and website is to use Woocommerce. WordPress is one of the most popular content management systems in the world and Woocommerce is one of the most popular e-commerce plugins for WordPress. WordPress is open source and has thousands of themes and plugins available. Woocommerce is one of the easiest e-Commerce platforms to setup. It has all the features you need to start a successful e-Commerce business: sales, support, product page, checkout page, customer dashboard, stock management, and product management.
